ðŸ“– Summary: IronRDP is a Rust library providing a secure implementation of the Microsoft Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). It offers various features including support for multiple video codecs and provides examples for both asynchronous and synchronous client implementations, enabling developers to build robust and secure remote desktop applications.
